title: TE-RME-Based Mobile Microlearning Program to Improve Preservice Mathematics Teachers’ Numeracy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics pedagogy and understanding of secondary curriculum mathematics content
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers learning math education methods applicable in real classroom settings, with mobile devices enabling access without time/space constraints

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design mathematical modeling through real-life problems integrated with local culture
Preservice teachers develop at least three assignments using smartphone-based tools to assess students' mathematical literacy
Preservice teachers improve their instructional design at least twice based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
